# Fraction Design Studio

### Circular Events Design

We are a boutique design studio specializing in experiential spaces, with sustainable practices at the heart of our design. Our team has been privileged to work with some of the largest luxury brands in the world. Our designs have graced pavilions at key national and regional trade shows, creating spaces that inspire conversations for all stakeholders. At Fraction, we take our clients along a journey of sustainability.

##### Expertise in the following

Circular Economy

All
